Summary: hole sky lite up green, to the point that it covered the whole town. all we could see was green everywhere. lasted for 15 secounds then was gone
divs: Sighting DetailsIf everyone that was there feels comfortable with me elaborating then I will. Until then, I wish not to do so. I just discovered this site and did not know that sites like this ever existed.
